character.description: Minerva is the strongest Mage of the currently strongest Guild in Fiore, Sabertooth Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Rabian
character.description: Rabian is the chairman of the Scheherazade Theater who performs plays. He once hired Team Natsu to stage a play in Onibus Town for him. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Zirconis
character.description: Zirconis, also known as The Jade Dragon (Hisui no Ryuu), was one of the many Dragons that was killed by Acnologia. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Toma E. Fiore
character.description: Toma E. Fiore is the King who rules over the Kingdom of Fiore. During the Grand Magic Games, Toma disguises himself as Mato and is the official mascot and referee for its events. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Bisca Connell
character.description: Bisca Connell, nee Mulan, was originally an immigrant from the West, who moved to Magnolia and joined the Fairy Tail Guild. Currently in year X791, she is the wife of Alzack Connell. Source: Fairy Tail Wikia

character.name: Skiadrum
character.description: Skiadrum was a Dragon known as The Shadow Dragon and was the foster parent of Rogue Cheney.

episode.title: 蛇姫の鱗[ラミアスケイル]感謝祭
The Lamia Scale Thanksgiving Festival
Le Thanksgiving de Lamia Scale
Lamia Scale Kanshasai
episode.summary: Natsu, Happy, and Lucy visit Lamia Scale to meet an old friend. Once they arrive, they`re shocked to learn how things have changed over the past year. Rebuilding Fairy Tail will be harder than they ever expected. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 愛しているから
Because of Love
Parce qu`il l`aime
Ai Shite Iru kara
episode.summary: Wendy and Shelia try to stop Orochi Fin`s attack by taking out the guild`s monster tamer... but a formidable and familiar foe stands in their way. During the encounter, Wendy and Shelia reflect on their long friendship. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黒魔術教団[アヴァタール]
Avatar
Avatar
Avatar
episode.summary: Natsu and friends find Juvia living alone in a deserted village. After she describes Gray`s mysterious behavior and disappearance, Natsu races to Sabertooth to prevent certain tragic events from unfolding. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地下の激闘
Underground Clash
Âpre Combat en sous-sol
Chika no Gekitou
episode.summary: Natsu, Happy, and Lucy sneak into Avatar`s headquarters in search of Gray. Unfortunately, they sneak directly into the cult`s torture room! The team is forced to battle Avatar`s top-level black wizards, including Gray himself. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 浄化作戦
The Purification Plan
Le plan de purification
Jouka Sakusen
episode.summary: Gray and Erza reveal the details of their secret mission. Meanwhile, the Avatar cult prepares to wipe out an entire city of innocent people to bring their Purification Plan to fruition. Natsu, Gray, and the others rush to stop them before it`s too late! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: イクサツナギ
Ikusatsunagi
Ikusa-tsunagi
Ikusatsunagi
episode.summary: Just when defeat seems inevitable, Arlock summons a mighty battle god known as Ikusatsunagi to slaughter his own men. He then reveals that this was the true Purification Plan all along. Natsu is enraged and faces Ikusatsunagi in a one-on-one battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 回想録
Memoirs
Souvenirs
Kaisouroku
episode.summary: Zeref shares the story of his childhood and how he came to be afflicted with his deadly Curse of Contradiction. Meanwhile, Lucy worries that the old Fairy Tail members have moved on and won`t want to help restart the Fairy Tail guild. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 七代目ギルドマスター
The 7th Guild Master
Le Septième Maître de la guilde
Nanadaime Guild Master
episode.summary: The Fairy Tail members get to work rebuilding their guildhall. They have faith that Makarov will return one day, but they need to choose a new master for the time being. Suddenly, a familiar face appears and reveals many secrets about Fairy Tail`s past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 空間の掟
Law of Space
Les Lois de l’espace
Kuukan no Okite
episode.summary: Natsu and friends set sail for the Alvarez Empire in order to rescue Makarov. They stop at Caracol Island along the way for supplies and information, but they instead encounter an explosive situation and a powerful new foe! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 皇帝スプリガン
Emperor Spriggan
L`empereur Spriggan
Koutei Spriggan
episode.summary: Fairy Tail`s infiltration team encounters Brandish, a powerful member of the Spriggan 12. Meanwhile, Makarov continues his negotiations with the Alvarez Empire.Suddenly, the emperor returns after a year-long absence. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神に見捨てられた地へ
To the God-Forsaken Land
La terre abandonnée par les dieux
Kami ni Misuterareta Tsuchi e
episode.summary: After reuniting with Makarov, Natsu and friends attempt to leave the Alvarez Empire. The Desert King Ajeel is in hot pursuit, however and easily overwhelms the Fairy Tail squad. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: メイビスとゼレフ
Mavis and Zeref
Mavis et Zeref
Mavis to Zeref
episode.summary: Mavis finally reveals the secrets of her past, including her connection with Fairy Tail, Zeref, and her own sin. The ever-turning gears of fate offer glimpses of hope, but also produce one final, tragic contradiction. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妖精の心臓[フェアリーハート]
Fairy Heart
Fairy Heart
Fairy Heart
episode.summary: Mavis finishes her story and reveals the true, terrifying nature of the Fairy Heart magic. Elsewhere, Zeref and the Spriggan 12 prepare their full-scale invasion of Ishgar. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マグノリア防衛戦
The Magnolia Defensive War
La défense de Magnolia
Magnolia Boueisen
episode.summary: Before the battle for Fairy Tail`s existence begins, the guild members spend the final night in their own ways. But when Alvarez`s vast army launches a surprise attack, Fairy Tail`s bond of solidarity is put to the test. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 明星
Morning Star
Étoile du matin
Myoujou
episode.summary: Fairy Tail is completey surrounded and greatly outnumbered. Lucy and Brandish have a bathtub showdown, Erza continues to struggle against Ajeel, and Natsu`s team members are forced to hold back their full strength. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: その香り[パルファム]は誰がために
For Whom the Parfum Flows
Pour qui est ce parfum ?
Sono Parfum wa Ta ga Tame ni
episode.summary: Ajeel of the Spriggan 12 has been defeated, but another member poses a new threat to Magnolia. Gray`s team struggles with an enemy that specializes in weaknesses while the Thunder Legion tries to protect Fried at all costs. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナツvs.ゼレフ
Natsu vs. Zeref
Natsu vs Zeleph
Natsu vs. Zeref
episode.summary: Wizard guilds all across Fiore join Fairy Tail in the battle against Zeref`s armies. Meanwhile, Natsu and Happy speed off to the west to defeat Zeref once and for all. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 400年の時を超え
Across 400 Years
400 ans d`attente
Yonhyakunen no Toki o Koe
episode.summary: Zeref, sensing his impending death, reveals the secret behind Natsu`s birth. After learning the shocking truth, Natsu swings his fist one last time. Meanwhile, Fiore`s wizard guilds begin to battle the Alvarez army and the Spriggan 12. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あたしのしたい事
What I Want to Do
Ce que je veux faire
Atashi no Shitai Koto
episode.summary: Brandish narrowly escapes death, thanks to some quick-thinking Fairy Tail members. After waking up, she reveals her past connection with Layla, Lucy`s mother. Before long, however, Brandish directs her sorrow and anger at Lucy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦いが終わるまでは
Not Until the Battle Is Over
Jusqu`à la fin de la bataille
Tatakai ga Owaru made wa
episode.summary: God Serena defeats the Four Emperors of Ishgar and brings the eastern battle to its apparent conclusion. Meanwhile, Gajeel, Erza, Laxus, and other Fairy Tail members depart for different locations to support the other guilds in battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 静かなる時の中で
In a Silent Time
Dans l`immobilité du temps
Shizuka naru Toki no Naka de
episode.summary: While fighting Wall, Laxus is incapacitated when his Bane Particle contamination reaches a critical level. To the east, Wendy and Shelia confront "Warrior Queen" Dimaria of the Spriggan 12, but are instantly overwhelmed. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復活のナツ!!
Natsu, Revived!!
Natsu de retour !
Fukkatsu no Natsu!!
episode.summary: Wendy is determined to use her Third Origin to defeat the powered-up Dimaria. But using it comes at a price: Wendy will never be able to use magic again. Meanwhile, another member of the Spriggan 12 singlehandedly attacks Fairy Tail`s home base. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 屍のヒストリア
Historia of Corpses
Historias des morts
Shikabane no Historia
episode.summary: Jacob unleashes his true anger after Lucy and Natsu thwart his initial plans. Eventually, he targets the other Fairy Tail members trapped in his alternate dimension. Meanwhile, the Hargeon battlefield is blanketed in darkness as a new foe appears. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 気魄
Mettle
Détermination
Kihaku
episode.summary: Neinhart produces Historias across the battlefield to plunge Hargeon into chaos. Past adversaries revive and attack the various guild members fighting to free the city. Erza struggles against three Historias at once, and soon finds herself immobilized… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 第三の印
The Third Seal
Le Troisième Sceau
Daisan no In
episode.summary: Natsu`s team heads east with Brandish to negotiate with August, the Wizard King. Meanwhile, Sabertooth and Blue Pegasus spring back into action after Gajeel`s team saves them. But the reinvigorated heroes face yet another nightmare… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ずっと二人で
Together, Always
Tous les deux, à jamais
Zutto Futari de
episode.summary: Gajeel attempts to defeat the invulnerable Bloodman in a last-ditch effort to save Levy. Meanwhile, Natsu`s team watches on as Brandish tries to negotiate with August. Elsewhere, Irene and Acnologia come face to face with each other. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: フェアリーテイル ZERO
Fairy Tail Zero
Fairy Tail Zero
Fairy Tail Zero
episode.summary: Irene`s Universe One spell reshapes the entire land of Fiore. All of the wizards from Ishgar are thrown into confusion, but they work together to make progress. Meanwhile, Mavis faces a new ordeal after she regains her physical form. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白きドラグニル
White Dragneel
Dragnir blanc
Shiroki Dragnir
episode.summary: Mirajane defeats her two powerful adversaries, but is caught by Irene before there`s time to celebrate. Elsewhere, the various Fairy Tail teams follow their own paths in order to save Mavis. But the enemy is fully prepared and waiting to stop them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 冬の魔導士
The Winter Wizard
Le Mage de l`hiver
Fuyu no Madoushi
episode.summary: Gildarts makes a surprise return and confronts God Serena on the battlefield. Natsu and friends continue their push toward their guildhall, but soon realize how terrifying the Spriggan 12 truly are when they`re fully assembled. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: グレイとジュビア
Gray and Juvia
Grey et Jubia
Gray to Juvia
episode.summary: Invel takes control of Gray and Juvia`s minds. Despite being close friends, the two are forced to loathe each other and fight to the death. As the fight progresses, Juvia listens to her feelings for Gray and resists in a way only she can. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゼレフ書最強の悪魔
The Mightiest Demon of the Book of Zeref
Le plus puissant démon des livres de Zeleph
Zeref Sho Saikyou no Akuma
episode.summary: Just as Gray learns E.N.D.`s true identity, Lucy faces off against Brandish. Lucy tries hard to avoid a fight, but her desperate pleas go unheard. With neither side willing to compromise, the ensuing battle triggers an all-new crisis. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 壊れた絆を
Broken Bonds
Les liens brisés
Kowareta Kizuna o
episode.summary: Natsu and Gray clash, unable to curb the hatred that has taken hold inside them. Meanwhile, Erza`s group struggles to break through the massive enemy army. After Irene unleashes her special power, Mavis and Makarov step in to save the day. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 快楽と苦痛
Pleasure and Pain
Plaisir et douleur
Kairaku to Kutsuu
episode.summary: Erza`s tears stop the fight between Gray and Natsu. Meanwhile, the remaining members of the Spriggan 12 commence a ferocious assault on Ishgar. August faces off against Crime Sorcière while Larcade unleashes an attack that affects friend and foe alike. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナツノココロ
Natsu`s Mind
L`esprit de Natsu
Natsu no Kokoro
episode.summary: Sting rushes to help as Larcade continues his relentless attack on Kagura`s group. Meanwhile, Natsu falls unconscious and wakes up inside his own mind. He then revisits lost memories that shed light on his past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白影竜のスティング
Sting, the White Shadow Dragon
Sting, le Dragon blanc de l`ombre
Shirokage Ryuu no Sting
episode.summary: Sting absorbs Rogue`s power and overwhelms Larcade with white and shadow magic. In response, Larcade unleashes the deadly Rest In Peace spell. Elsewhere, after an intense battle, Irene reveals a secret to Erza about her past. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 竜の種
Dragon Seed
Graine de dragon
Ryuu no Tane
episode.summary: Irene shares the story of her past, including the secret of Erza`s birth. She also reveals the origin of Dragon Slayer magic, her connection with Zeref, and the sad fate that Dragon Slayers bear. Meanwhile, Natsu continues his journey inside his mind. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 極限付加術[マスターエンチャント]
Master Enchant
Enchantement suprême
Master Enchant
episode.summary: Irene and Erza face each other in an epic battle. When Wendy assists Erza, Irene makes a sudden realization that spells instant doom for Wendy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 竜か悪魔か
Dragon or Demon
Dragon ou démon
Ryuu ka Akuma ka
episode.summary: Irene unleashes Deus Sema, a power beyond human comprehension. With only her right arm, Erza combats the spell that threatens the entire area. Meanwhile, Natsu is forced to make an important decision that will forever change his fate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: グレイの切り札
Gray`s Trump Card
L`atout de Grey
Gray no Furifuda
episode.summary: Magnolia reverts to its proper form after Irene`s defeat. As retaliation, August prepares to destroy the town and everyone in it. Elsewhere, Gray reaches Zeref and is the first to learn about Zeref`s true objective. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黒い未来
Dark Future
Futur sombre
Kuroi Mirai
episode.summary: Gray makes the ultimate choice to sacrifice his life and his very existence in order to trap Zeref in ice for all eternity. Meanwhile, the mighty Acnologia finally reaches Magnolia and causes great concern for both sides of the war. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ぼくのなまえは...
My Name Is...
Je m`appelle...
Boku no Namae wa...
episode.summary: August seeks to understand the love that is shared between parent and child. When he threatens to kill Cana, Gildarts responds with rage. Meanwhile, Natsu and Zeref continue their epic battle, but a new situation develops when Larcade arrives. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 情
Compassion
Sentiments
Jou
episode.summary: Larcade scowls in pain after Zeref rejects him as a son. Meanwhile, August begins to cast a powerful spell that threatens to destroy all of Magnolia, along with himself. Elsewhere, Erza and Wendy come face to face with the almighty Acnologia. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ネオ・エクリプス
Neo Eclipse
Néo-Éclipse
Neo Eclipse
episode.summary: Erza`s team meets a mysterious woman with a plan that can completely destroy Acnologia. Meanwhile, Lucy and friends struggle to come to terms with the truth that connects Natsu`s life and the Book of E.N.D. that they now hold. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 愛はもう見えない
Blind to Love
Je ne vois plus d`amour
Ai wa Mou Mienai
episode.summary: Anna, Blue Pegasus, and Erza`s team attempt to destroy Acnologia using a hidden rift in time. Elsewhere, Zeref finally obtains everything he needs to reset time and relive his life 400 years earlier, before he turned immortal. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 誓いの扉
The Door of Vows
La porte des promesses
Chikai no Tobira
episode.summary: Zeref obtains the power of a god - a power that transcends even time. Natsu seethes with a fiery rage as he holds the unconscious Mavis in his arms. Meanwhile, Acnologia continues to attack Blue Pegasus` ship as Anna struggles to re-open the time rift. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 荒ぶる竜の炎
Raging Fire of the Dragon
Les flammes du dragon déchaîné
Araburu Ryuu no Honoo
episode.summary: Fairy Tail and Blue Pegasus continue to battle Acnologia. With the time rift now open, they`re forced to make a difficult decision. In the guildhall, Natsu makes a miraculous recovery and confronts Zeref one final time. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 炎消える時
When the Fire Dies
Lorsque les flammes s`éteignent
Honoo Kieru Toki
episode.summary: Mavis faces Zeref alone inside Fairy Tail`s guildhall. As she reveals her conflicting feelings and the key to her plan, Zeref makes a sudden realization. Meanwhile, Lucy`s team watches as Zeref`s Book of E.N.D. starts to fade away… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 世界崩壊
World Destruction
Le monde s`écroule
Sekai Houkai
episode.summary: Zeref is gone, and Acnologia is now trapped inside a rift in time. Just when it seems like it`s time to celebrate, an ominous crack appears in the sky. What`s more, all of the Dragon Slayers suddenly vanish into thin air. The battle isn`t over just yet! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 希望の魔法
Magic of Hope
Le sort de l’espoir
Kibou no Mahou
episode.summary: Inside the time rift, and with the fate of the world on the line, the seven Dragon Slayers battle Acnologia. Outside the rift, Acnologia`s physical form continues to wreak havoc. The situation seems hopeless, until Lucy comes up with a last-ditch plan… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 繋がる心
Hearts Connected
Liés par le cœur
Tsunagaru Kokoro
episode.summary: Lucy`s plan for stopping Acnologia`s physical form is immediately ruined, but everyone comes together to keep hope alive. Inside the time rift, Natsu and the other Dragon Slayers face the spirit form of Acnologia in an epic seven-against-one battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: かけがえのない仲間たち
Dearest Friends
Des compagnons irremplaçables
Kakegae no Nai Nakama-tachi
episode.summary: Using the power of all seven Dragon Slayers, Natsu unleashes one final, soulful attack on Acnologia. One year later, Lucy reveals everything that has happened since the battle. Source: crunchyroll
